description: Numbers n such that n^n + n - 1 is prime.
comments: Except for the first term all terms are of the form 3k or 3k+1. There is no further term up to 2300. - _Farideh Firoozbakht_, Oct 18 2006Corresponding values of primes are in A187605. - _Jaroslav Krizek_, Nov 14 2013
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[ n^n + n - 1], Print[n]], {n, 1, 750} ]
author: _Felice Russo_, Jan 10 2001
extensions: One more term from _Farideh Firoozbakht_, Oct 18 2006
